html.p: Proposition. If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]n\times p[/mathjaxinline] matrix, and the columns of [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are linearly dependent, then the columns of [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] must be linearly dependent.
